channel.title: this mod is dead...
channel.description:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dgmcAIMHKYs&feature=related']this mod is dead....[/url]but it looks so incredible I can't believe it's goldsource. Source code for the incredible effects is available too...why has no one used it :frowning:
edit:the teams doing a [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-1-arrangement/videos/training-bit-with-bumpmaps#imagebox']different mod though now[/url](also in gldsrc) and **** ****** **** does it ever look good 0_0

item.title: this mod is dead...

item.description:
Although there are many great HL2 mods out there. Half-Life had the best of the best, for example, They Hunger. I prefer HL mods over HL2.

item.title: this mod is dead...
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
garthbartin:

I’ve never really got why poeple bother moding for HL1. Any respectable computer these days can handle HL2, so why don’t they just mod for it? That said, that is really impressive for goldsrc.

It’s easier to develop new things for it.

Read full topic
